pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [187d5a3d60](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16859/commits/187d5a3d60745e7b06307c8da53872bc56145ae5)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Analysis.LocallyConvex.WeakSpace`|1533|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ Convex.toWeakSpace_closure`
`+ LinearEquiv.image_closure_of_convex`
`+ LinearEquiv.image_closure_of_convex'`
`+ LinearMap.image_closure_of_convex`
`+ instModule'`
`+ instance (priority := 100) instModule' [CommSemiring ùïú] [CommSemiring ùïù] [AddCommMonoid E]`
`+ toWeakSpaceCLM`
`+ toWeakSpaceCLM_bijective`
`+ toWeakSpaceCLM_eq_toWeakSpace`
`++ instAddCommGroup`
`++ instTopologicalAddGroup`
`- continuousLinearMapToWeakSpace`
`- continuousLinearMapToWeakSpace_bijective`
`- continuousLinearMapToWeakSpace_eq_toWeakSpace`
`- instance (priority := 100) instModule' [CommSemiring ùïú] [CommSemiring ùïù] [AddCommGroup E]`
`-++ instIsScalarTower`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

:v: j-loreaux can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10934429111/job/30354492536)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10934429111/job/30354493087)
This all looks great to me.
This all looks great to me.

Perhaps instead:

See`LinearEquiv.image_closure_of_convex` below.

Although this assumes that the file will not be reorganized, it isn't obvious to the reader that the result in question will lie in this file and so it isn't obvious to look for it in what follows.
That shouldn't matter much. It will be clickable in the docs, and in the editor you could just grep.

```suggestion
in a locally convex space coincides with the closure in the original topology.

```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: closures of convex sets in locally convex spaces with the same continuous linear functionals
